abstract: Our reaction to allegations we are trying to break up Hazare's civil society movement.
snippet: Our reaction to allegations we are trying to break up Hazare's civil society movement.
lead_paragraph: Plainspoken and unguarded, Anna Hazare spoke at some length with India Ink contributors Lydia Polgreen and Hari Kumar during their visit to Ralegan Siddhi last week. He expressed surprise that his fast had stirred up such passions, and spoke candidly about the difficulties of managing such a diverse coalition of prominent civil society leaders.
